thread.title: Kevin Wilkes
thread.title_full: Grand Home Furnishings reviewed by Kevin Wilkes

author: Kevin Wilkes
title: Kevin Wilkes
text: Over the last 10 or 12 years my wife and I have filled our new home (family room, master bedroom {to include an AWESOME Tempur-Pedic mattress} dining room and other areas, home theater, and soon a finished basement. We are so happy with Grand's (Colleen and her staff), we even went back to furnish our renovated volunteer fire station. A+.
